headline.print_headline: Nearly One in Three Americans Owns a Gun
headline.main: Nearly One in Three Americans Owns a Gun

docs.lead_paragraph: Almost a third of American adults own a gun, but the rate varies widely by state and tops out at almost 62 percent of people in Alaska, new survey data show.
docs.snippet: Almost a third of American adults own a gun, but the rate varies widely by state and tops out at almost 62 percent of people in Alaska, new survey data show.

headline.print_headline: FDA Weighs New Restrictions on Liquid Nicotine Products
headline.main: FDA Weighs New Restrictions on Liquid Nicotine Products

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal health officials are considering whether to require new warnings and child-resistant packaging on liquid nicotine formulas used with e-cigarettes and other emerging tobacco products.
docs.snippet: Federal health officials are considering whether to require new warnings and child-resistant packaging on liquid nicotine formulas used with e-cigarettes and other emerging tobacco products.
